course_description: Master the fundamentals of C programming and start your journey into the world of software development.
Learn the essential AWS services and cloud computing concepts to build scalable and reliable applications.
Delve into C programming, the foundation of many software systems, and develop coding expertise.
Take your C programming skills to the next level with advanced concepts and real-world applications.
Explore essential data structures and algorithms for efficient problem-solving in software development.
Enhance your problem-solving skills with practical exercises and strategies for coding challenges and interviews.
Get started with MySQL and learn how to manage databases for web applications and data-driven projects.
Build a solid foundation in web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals.
Explore software engineering principles, methodologies, and best practices for creating robust applications.
